title: Lal pian hun lawmawm tak kan thleng leh ta
lyrics:
Lal pian hun lawmawm tak kan thleng leh ta,
Hlim taka lawmin zai I vawr ang;
Thihna thim hnuaia thute tan enna rupui a thleng ta,
Haleluia! lawmin i zai ang.

A hming Maka, Remruattu Lalpa,
Chatuan Pa, Rem lal rupui ani;
A ramin kin ni a nei lovang,
A zau zel ang chatuan thleng pawhin.

Tunah hian Bethlehem khaw lamah chuan,
Rinnain thlawkin va leng ila;
Chunriang Marichawi lei leh van lal riangvaia kan hmu ang,
Kan neih ro thil zawng zawng i pe ang.

Rinin ka han thlir a. ka chung van khua,
Remna lal Fapa lo pian ni chuan;
Thenna zai an rem, an aw mawi thangkhawk chuan
khawvel zawng leh,
Ka chung thangvan sang khi a nghawr vel.

Min tlantu lalber thar lo pianga chu,
A hming lal Krista Imanuela;
Hosana chungnung berah khian ropui takin awm rawh se
Remna thu leng se khawvelah hian.
